10-09-2011, 02:09 PM #1 scuba477 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Sep 2008 Posts 106 Free after Rebate From Staples I am not sure if this is in the right spot or if it has already been posted. I searched and didn't find it:
Free after Rebate Items from Staples:
1) Scotch Pop-Up Desk Grip Tape Dispenser Free after $2.99 Easy Rebate 2) 3-pack Command Picture Medium Hanging Strips Free after $2.99 Easy Rebate 3) 60-pack Staples Mixed Coin Wrappers Free after $2.50 Easy Rebate
Note, rebates will appear on receipt when you checkout at your local store.
Staples : http://www.staples.com/ Store locator: http://stores.staples-locator.com/staples/ Staples Easy Rebate : https://www.stapleseasyrebates.com/i...s/Landing.html Staples Weekly AD : http://weeklyad.staples.com/staples/...:WEKLY_:NULL:: Reply With Quote
